title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 179-4.3 - Communication of rules
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 179-4.3 - Communication of rules

State Regulations

Upon each facility or program admission, each resident
shall be given a copy of all rules. The rules shall be explained to the
resident. The resident and the staff who explained the rules shall sign an
acknowledgment. The original is to be filed in the resident's case file, and a
copy is to be given to the resident. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
179-4.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
